updaterMode.title: Device still not detected?
updaterMode.subtitle: Try putting your KeepKey into updater mode:

steps.2: Hold down the button on your KeepKey
steps.3: While holding the button, reconnect the USB cable
steps.4: Release the button when you see the KeepKey logo

bootloaderUpdate.subtitle: Critical security update for your device
bootloaderUpdate.description: This update improves device security and stability

enterBootloader.title: Enter Bootloader Mode
enterBootloader.subtitle: Follow these steps to enter bootloader mode

steps.2: Press and hold the button on your KeepKey
steps.3: While holding the button, reconnect the USB cable
steps.4: Continue holding until you see 'BOOTLOADER' on the screen

enterBootloader.note: Your device will restart in bootloader mode for the update
